html: The Financial Relief for Federal Employees Act directs the Federal Government to issue loans to federal workers with zero interest and zero fees if a shutdown exceeds 15 consecutive days.

html: The #RaiseTheWage Act would give more than 40 million people a raise and is a crucial tool in lifting folks out of poverty.
text: The #RaiseTheWage Act would give more than 40 million people a raise and is a crucial tool in lifting folks out of poverty.

html: The #RaiseTheWage act increases the federal minimum wage to $15/hr by 2024. It’ll also get rid of the sub-minimum wage for tipped workers, youth, and folks with disabilities.
text: The #RaiseTheWage act increases the federal minimum wage to $15/hr by 2024. It’ll also get rid of the sub-minimum wage for tipped workers, youth, and folks with disabilities.

html: Proud to be a co-sponsor on the #RaiseTheWage Act. House and Senate Democrats introduced this much needed bill today. The current $7.25 federal minimum wage is not enough for someone to put food on the table and keep a roof over their head.
text: Proud to be a co-sponsor on the #RaiseTheWage Act. House and Senate Democrats introduced this much needed bill today. The current $7.25 federal minimum wage is not enough for someone to put food on the table and keep a roof over their head.

html: There is no place in America where someone working full time & making the $7.25 federal minimum wage can make ends meet. Today, House & Senate Democrats are introducing the #RaiseTheWage Act to give roughly 40 million workers a raise.pic.twitter.com/6fgmjy5ORC

html: Every time Trump talks about this "crisis," I ask: How can this be a "crisis" when he had a GOP House and Senate for TWO YEARS, and there was no crisis then? He could not get his own party to fund this "crisis." And now that Dems control the House, it's a "crisis." Baloney.
text:
Every time Trump talks about this "crisis," I ask: How can this be a "crisis" when he had a GOP House and Senate for TWO YEARS, and there was no crisis then? He could not get his own party to fund this "crisis."

And now that Dems control the House, it's a "crisis." 

Baloney.
